facts.text: A group of flamingos is called a 'flamboyance'.
Honey never spoils. Archaeologists have found pots of honey in ancient Egyptian tombs that are over 3,000 years old and still perfectly edible.
The human brain contains approximately 86 billion neurons.
Cleopatra lived closer in time to the Moon landing than to the construction of the Great Pyramid of Giza.
A single cloud can weigh more than a million pounds.
Octopuses have three hearts and blue blood.
Bananas are berries, but strawberries aren't.
Your stomach gets an entirely new lining every 3-4 days because stomach acid would otherwise digest it.
The Great Wall of China isn't visible from space with the naked eye, contrary to popular belief.
Light from the Sun takes about 8 minutes and 20 seconds to reach Earth.
Wombat droppings are cube-shaped.
The shortest war in history lasted only 38-45 minutes between Britain and Zanzibar in 1896.
You can't taste food properly without smell - about 80% of taste is actually smell.
A group of pandas is called an 'embarrassment'.
Carrots were originally purple, not orange.
It's impossible to hum while holding your nose closed.
The first computer bug was an actual bug - a moth stuck in a computer relay in 1947.
Sharks have been around longer than trees.
Napoleon was actually average height for his time at 5'7".
Your foot is the same length as the distance between your wrist and elbow.
Pineapples take about 18-20 months to grow.
A group of owls is called a 'parliament'.
The human eye can distinguish about 10 million colors.
Diamond rain falls on Neptune and Uranus.
Vikings actually reached America 500 years before Columbus.
Chocolate was once used as currency by the Aztecs.
Dolphins have names for each other - unique whistle signatures.
The world's largest snowflake on record was 15 inches wide.
A croissant is actually Austrian, not French - it was invented in Vienna.
A teaspoon of neutron star material would weigh about 6 billion tons.
Octopuses have three hearts and blue blood.
There are more possible games of chess than there are atoms in the observable universe.
Wombat poop is cube-shaped to prevent it from rolling away.
You can hear a blue whale's heartbeat from over 2 miles away.
The smell of rain has a name: petrichor.
Cleopatra lived closer in time to the Moon landing than to the construction of the Great Pyramid.
Your tongue print is as unique as your fingerprint.
A day on Venus is longer than a year on Venus.
Bananas are berries, but strawberries aren't.
The human brain uses about 20% of the body's total energy.
A group of ravens is called a 'murder'.
There's a giant cloud of alcohol in space that's 1000 times larger than our solar system.
The shortest war in history lasted only 38-45 minutes.
Your stomach gets completely new lining every 3-5 days.
Sloths only defecate once a week and lose up to 30% of their body weight when they do.
Cashews grow attached to a fruit called a cashew apple.
The first computer programmer was a woman: Ada Lovelace in 1843.
Oxford University is older than the Aztec Empire.
Sharks have been around longer than trees.
One teaspoon of honey represents the life work of 12 bees.
Jupiter's moon Europa has twice as much water as Earth's oceans.
Your left lung is smaller than your right lung to make room for your heart.
The electric chair was invented by a dentist.
Penguins have an organ above their eyes that converts seawater to freshwater.
A group of pugs is called a 'grumble'.
The hottest temperature ever recorded on Earth was in a laboratory: 5.5 trillion degrees Celsius.
Pineapples take 2 years to grow.
Your bones are 4 times stronger than concrete.
There are more trees on Earth than stars in the Milky Way.
The immortal jellyfish can reverse its aging process and live forever.
Nintendo was founded in 1889 as a playing card company.
The word 'set' has the most different meanings in English with over 430 definitions.
Saturn's moon Titan has lakes and rivers of liquid methane.
Humans share 50% of their DNA with bananas.
The Great Wall of China isn't visible from space with the naked eye.
Elephants are one of the few animals that can recognize themselves in a mirror.
Vanilla flavoring comes from beaver scent glands.
Your body produces 25 million new cells every second.
The speed of light is 299,792,458 meters per second.
Lobsters were once considered poor people's food and fed to prisoners.
A mantis shrimp can punch with the force of a bullet.
The moon is gradually moving away from Earth at 3.8 cm per year.
Your eye has the same pixels as a 576-megapixel camera.
The first email was sent in 1971.
Sea otters hold hands while sleeping to prevent drifting apart.
The human heart beats about 3 billion times in an average lifetime.
Bubble wrap was originally invented as wallpaper.
The largest living organism is a fungus in Oregon covering 2,385 acres.
Polar bears have black skin under their white fur.
There are more bacteria in your mouth than people on Earth.
The word 'alphabet' comes from the first two Greek letters: alpha and beta.
Mars has the largest volcano in the solar system: Olympus Mons.
A single cloud can weigh more than a million pounds.
Cows have best friends and get stressed when separated.
The human body contains about 37.2 trillion cells.
Ketchup was sold as medicine in the 1830s.
The internet weighs about the same as a strawberry.
T-Rex lived closer in time to humans than to Stegosaurus.
Hummingbirds are the only birds that can fly backwards.
Your brain is 2% of your body weight but uses 20% of your energy.
The Eiffel Tower grows 6 inches taller in summer due to thermal expansion.
Dragonflies have a 95% hunting success rate, higher than sharks.
The first computer bug was an actual bug stuck in a computer in 1947.
There are more possible positions in chess than atoms in Earth.
A group of unicorns is called a 'blessing'.
The sun is white, not yellow. It appears yellow due to Earth's atmosphere.
Your fingernails grow faster on your dominant hand.
Pizza was the first food ordered online in 1994.
The longest recorded flight of a chicken is 13 seconds.
Your body produces enough saliva in a lifetime to fill two swimming pools.
QWERTY keyboard was designed to slow down typing to prevent typewriter jams.
Dinosaurs lived on Earth for 165 million years. Humans have only been around for 300,000 years.
A narwhal's tusk is actually a tooth that can grow up to 10 feet long.
The coldest temperature ever recorded was -144Â°F in Antarctica.
Avocados are fruits, not vegetables, and they're actually berries.
You can't hum while holding your nose closed.
The first camera took 8 hours to take a single photograph.
Pluto was discovered in 1930 and declassified as a planet in 2006 - it never completed one orbit of the sun as a planet.
Giraffes only need 5-30 minutes of sleep per day.
The human nose can detect over 1 trillion different scents.
Carrots were originally purple, not orange.
The word 'byte' is a shortened version of 'binary digit eight'.
Male seahorses are the only males in the animal kingdom that give birth.
A bolt of lightning is 5 times hotter than the surface of the sun.
The human brain has the same consistency as tofu.
Fortune cookies are not a Chinese tradition - they were invented in California.
There are more ways to arrange a deck of cards than there are seconds since the Big Bang.
Tardigrades can survive in outer space and can live for 30 years without food.
The plastic things on the end of shoelaces are called aglets.
If you could fold a piece of paper 42 times, it would reach the moon.
A shrimp's heart is in its head.
Water can boil and freeze at the same time under certain conditions.
Ancient Romans used urine as mouthwash.
Your foot is the same length as the distance between your wrist and elbow.
Rats laugh when tickled.
Rhubarb grows so fast you can hear it growing.
Black holes can spin at up to 1,000 times per second.
Your body contains enough iron to make a 3-inch nail.
Ants never sleep.
Glass is technically a liquid, not a solid.
Napoleon was actually average height for his time.
Apples are more effective at waking you up than coffee.
Saturn's rings are only about 30 feet thick.
You blink about 17,000 times per day.
Koalas have fingerprints almost identical to humans.
The Great Pyramid was the tallest building in the world for 3,800 years.
Lemons contain more sugar than strawberries.
Mercury is the only metal that's liquid at room temperature.
The Milky Way galaxy smells like raspberries and rum.
Your hair grows faster in warm weather.
Mosquitoes are the deadliest animals to humans.
Vikings never actually wore horned helmets.
Spicy food makes you sweat, which actually cools you down.
Diamond rain falls on Jupiter and Saturn.
You can't breathe and swallow at the same time.
A group of owls is called a 'parliament'.
The speed of sound is faster through solid objects than air.
Ancient Egyptians used moldy bread as an antibiotic.
Almonds are not nuts - they're seeds.
A day on Mercury lasts 59 Earth days.
Your stomach acid is strong enough to dissolve metal.
Cats have a third eyelid.
Lightning strikes the Earth 100 times per second.
The first recorded recipe was for beer in ancient Mesopotamia.
Watermelons are 92% water.
The center of the Milky Way tastes like raspberries.
You lose about 8 pounds of dead skin cells every year.
Pigs can't look up at the sky.
The color orange was named after the fruit, not the other way around.
Ice cream headaches happen because blood vessels in your brain expand rapidly.
Butterflies taste with their feet.
Sound waves can be used to levitate objects.
The ancient Greeks used stones as toilet paper.
Tomatoes were once thought to be poisonous.
There are more galaxies in the universe than grains of sand on all Earth's beaches.
Your ears never stop growing.
Kangaroos can't walk backwards.
Diamonds can be made from peanut butter.
The Aztecs used cocoa beans as currency.
Wasabi is actually colored horseradish in most restaurants.
A neutron star the size of a sugar cube would weigh 100 million tons.
You can't tickle yourself because your brain anticipates it.
Snails can sleep for up to 3 years.
The human brain generates about 12-25 watts of electricity.
Bananas are radioactive.
The Great Wall of China uses rice as mortar.
Lobsters were immortal until they evolved aging.
The human eye can distinguish 10 million colors.
Raindrops are perfectly spherical only in zero gravity.
The world's hottest chili pepper can kill you.
Space is completely silent because there's no air to carry sound waves.
Ancient Romans used to brush their teeth with urine.
Crocodiles can't stick their tongues out.
Your body produces 1.5 liters of saliva every day.
Absolute zero is the coldest possible temperature: -459.67Â°F.
Chocolate chip cookies were invented by accident.
The Earth's core is as hot as the surface of the Sun.
Cleopatra lived closer to the Moon landing than to the building of the Great Pyramid.
Flamingos can only eat with their heads upside down.
Your brain uses 20% of your body's total energy.
There are more bacteria in your body than human cells.
The word 'muscle' comes from Latin meaning 'little mouse'.
Cinnamon comes from tree bark.
The sun loses 4 million tons of mass every second.
Penguins propose to their mates with pebbles.
Your heart beats about 100,000 times per day.
The probability of you existing is roughly 1 in 400 trillion.
Stonehenge is older than the Egyptian pyramids.
Mushrooms are more closely related to humans than to plants.
The Great Red Spot on Jupiter is a storm that's been raging for at least 400 years.
